posts.post_content:
I have 2 signed T-202, Zach Wheats. You can see them on 
T206collector.com. Signed T202's are extremely rare
I might be willing to trade one of them for another signed pre war card I need (HOF only) or possibly a rare signed pre WW2 signed HOFer I need (I do not have a list of who I need).
Will not sell. Send any serious trade offer to [url]theshleps@aol.com[/url].
No Marquards. Only signed cards or early signed exhibits
While I appreciate the free web traffic, scans also are here for your convenience.
I know you said you won't sell, but I'd buy the second one from you if you ever decide to part with it for cash.
